name: Green Mayonnaise
keywords: eggs, herbs, oil, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons tarragon or white wine vinegar
Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Put the chives, tarragon, parsley, vinegar, egg and garlic into a blender or food processor. Add the mustard and one tablespoon olive oil. Process for 10 seconds, then add the oils in a thin stream very slowly while you process. Keep adding oil until the mayonnaise is thick.
